properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM ONETOONE WHERE ANSWER_STATE = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT ONETO_NO , MEM_NAME , ONETO_TYPE , ONETO_NAME , ANSWER_DATE , ANSWER_STATE FROM ONETOONE JOIN MEMBER ON(WRITER_NO=MEM_NO) JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY ON(ONETO_TYPE=FAQ_CATEGORY_NO) WHERE ANSWER_STATE = 'N' ORDER BY ONETO_NO ASC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
